811.2 An application for joint venture certification may be submitted to andeviewed by the Department simultaneously with an application for certificationf one or more of the individual venturers as a CBE.
811.3 The Department may deny certification of any joint venture whose jointenture agreement lacks any of the provisions in § 811.1.
